nugewala madhya maha widyalaya ha ampara di.es senanayaka jathika pasala athara tharagaya amparedi, nugewala madhya widyala palamu inima - oowara 29 kadi siyalu dena dawi lakunu 83 (lasantha sanjaya 37, wiraj hemantha 26, chamidu sandushka 11/6, yasindu ruwanga 35/2 ) di.es senanayaka jathika pale palamu inima - oowara 63.4 kadi kadulu 9 kata lakunu 264 (kalpana aadhithya 94, inura amanda 40, nawod pansilu 28, radishan ushara 24, chanura deshan 21, hasantha madhura nodawi 20, hasintha iduwara 36/3, kawishka jayathissa 36/3, dinuka pramod 64/2 ) nugewala madhya widyala dewani inima - oowara 51.5 kadi siyalu dena dawi lakunu 150 ( wiraj hemantha 93, inura amantha 45/6 ) ampara di.es senanayaka jathika pasalata inimaka saha lakunu 31 ka jayak himi wiya.
